titleStmt.title: A fourth volume of familiar letters, upon various emergent occasions, partly [brace] philosophical, political, historical. [brace] / By James Hovvell Esq. clerk of the councell to his late Majestie. Never publish'd before.
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
Howell, James, 1594?-1666. Correspondence.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Princes Arms in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Also published as vol. 4 of his Epistolæ Ho-elianæ.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
